get.description: Fetch the server configuration for this Revolt instance.
Fetch various technical statistics.

post.description: This is a privileged route to globally fetch messages.

get.description: Retrieve your user information.
Retrieve a user's information.
Retrieve a user's flags.
This returns a default avatar based on the given id.

Retrieve a user's profile data.

Will fail if you do not have permission to access the other user's profile.
This fetches your direct messages, including any DM and group DM conversations.

Open a DM with another user.

If the target is oneself, a saved messages channel is returned.
Retrieve a list of mutual friends and servers with another user.

parameters.name: nearby
parameters.description:
Message id to search around

Specifying 'nearby' ignores 'before', 'after' and 'sort'. It will also take half of limit rounded as the limits to each side. It also fetches the message ID specified.

schema.description:
Message id to search around

Specifying 'nearby' ignores 'before', 'after' and 'sort'. It will also take half of limit rounded as the limits to each side. It also fetches the message ID specified.

post.description: This route searches for messages within the given parameters.

This route returns any changed message objects and tells you if any have been deleted.

Don't actually poll this route, instead use this to update your local database.

**DEPRECATED**

get.description: Retrieves a message by its id.

delete.description: Delete a message you've sent or one you have permission to delete.

patch.description: Edits a message that you've previously sent.

delete.description:
Delete multiple messages you've sent or one you have permission to delete.

This will always require `ManageMessages` permission regardless of whether you own the message or not.

Messages must have been sent within the past 1 week.

Sets permissions for the default role in this channel.

Channel must be a `Group`, `TextChannel` or `VoiceChannel`.

delete.description:

parameters.name: remove_all

delete.description:
Remove your own, someone else's or all of a given reaction.

This will return an object with the requested keys, each value is a tuple of `(timestamp, value)`, the value is the previously uploaded data.

Timestamp of settings change.

Used to avoid feedback loops.

features.description: Features enabled on this Revolt node

app.description: URL pointing to the client serving this node

invite_only.description: Whether this server is invite only

key.description: Client key used for solving captcha

url.description: URL pointing to the voice API

ws.description: URL pointing to the voice WebSocket server

Permission.description:
Permission value on Revolt

This should be restricted to the lower 52 bits to prevent any potential issues with Javascript. Also leave empty spaces for future permission flags to be added.

since.description: Timestamp at which data keeping begun

latency.description: Timestamp at which data keeping begun

nonTailable.description: Number of total collection scans not using a tailable cursor

BulkMessageResponse.title: Bulk Message Response
BulkMessageResponse.description: Response used when multiple messages are fetched

Message.description: Representation of a Message on Revolt

nonce.description: Unique value generated by client sending this message

channel.description: Id of the channel this message was sent in

author.description: Id of the user or webhook that sent this message

webhook.description: The webhook that sent this message

edited.description: Time at which this message was last edited

mentions.description: Array of user ids mentioned in this message

replies.description: Array of message ids this message is replying to

reactions.description: Hashmap of emoji IDs to array of user IDs

interactions.description: Information about how this message should be interacted with

masquerade.description: Name and / or avatar overrides for this message

MessageWebhook.description: Information about the webhook bundled with Message

SystemMessage.description: Representation of a system event message

File.description: Representation of a File on Revolt Generated by Autumn

tag.description: Tag / bucket this file was uploaded to

content_type.description: Raw content type of this file

object_id.description: Id of the object this file is associated with

oneOf.description: File is just a generic uncategorised file
File contains textual data and should be displayed as such
File is an image with specific dimensions
File is a video with specific dimensions

Content hint that this contains a GIF

Use metadata to find video or image to play

Interactions.description: Information to guide interactions on this message

reactions.description: Reactions which should always appear and be distinct

restrict_reactions.description:
Whether reactions should be restricted to the given list

Can only be set to true if reactions list is of at least length 1

Masquerade.description: Name and / or avatar override information

name.description: Replace the display name shown on this message

avatar.description: Replace the avatar shown on this message (URL to image file)

colour.description:
Replace the display role colour shown on this message

Must have `ManageRole` permission to use

online.description: Whether this user is currently online

owner.description: Id of the owner of this bot

timeout.description: Timestamp this member is timed out until

nearby.description:
Message id to search around

Specifying 'nearby' ignores 'before', 'after' and 'sort'. It will also take half of limit rounded as the limits to each side. It also fetches the message ID specified.

after.description: Message id after which messages should be fetched

Maximum number of messages to fetch

New user profile data

content.description: Text to set as user profile description

Channel.description: Representation of a channel on Revolt

user.description: Id of the user this channel belongs to

oneOf.description: Direct message channel between two users

active.description: Whether this direct message channel is currently open on both sides

recipients.description: 2-tuple of user ids participating in direct message

oneOf.description: Group channel between 1 or more participants

recipients.description: Array of user ids participating in channel

last_message_id.description: Id of the last message sent in this channel

permissions.description: Permissions assigned to members of this group (does not apply to the owner of the group)

nsfw.description: Whether this group is marked as not safe for work

role_permissions.description: Permissions assigned based on role to this channel

servers.description: Array of mutual server IDs that both users are in

username.description: Username and discriminator combo separated by #
